prospects.name: Matthew Christy
prospects.first_line: Matthew, managing 52+ Bluestone Lane locations across the Northeast must require incredible coordination - how are you handling scheduling across all those cafes?
prospects.evidence_quote: Bluestone Lane operates 52 coffee shops and cafés across the U.S. and Canada

prospects.name: Isaac Reback
prospects.first_line: Isaac, with sweetgreen opening 23-27 new locations this year, your talent resourcing role must be incredibly busy - how are you managing hourly staffing across that expansion?
prospects.evidence_quote: For the fiscal year 2024, we updated our guidance to reflect the strength of the first quarter, 23 to 27 net new restaurant openings

prospects.name: Tiffany Porter
prospects.first_line: Tiffany, with PCRK Group's recent acquisition of 36 Massage Envy locations, regional operations management must be evolving rapidly - how are you coordinating staffing across multiple franchisees?
prospects.evidence_quote: PCRK Group, a leading provider of high-quality skincare and body care services, is thrilled to announce the acquisition of 36 Massage Envy locations
